input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.description: Path to a directory with IDAT files for the samples in the experiment.
input.help_text: You will need to create a directory containing two IDAT files per each sample

output.description: Path to a directory for the result of the pipeline.
output.help_text: You will need to create a directory for the results of the pipeline

sample_sheet.description:
Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.

Sample sheet fields:
 1) Sample_Name (unique, mandatory), 
 2) Array_Position (unique, mandatory, denotes position of a sample on a microarray in a form Sentrix ID_Sentrix Position, 
3) Sex (optional, but required for sex inference analysis - denotes declared sample sex [allowed values: FEMALE, MALE])
4) Sample_Group (optional) - sample phenotype (e.g. Treated/Cancer)
sample_sheet.help_text: You will need to create a design file with information about the samples in your experiment before running the pipeline. Use this parameter to specify its location. It has to be a comma-separated file with 2 columns, and a header row

cpus.description: Number of CPUs to use for analysis
cpus.help_text: Provide the number of CPUs that will be used by the pipeline

prep_code.help_text: Provide SeSAME-recommended prep code matching your array version and organism
